"Don't Get Cocky":
"Word is you've been working hard out there.
No need to be modest now. It's good to hear
how well you've been doing. I reckon you're
starting to gain confidence in your abilities, what
with your recent exploits, but this is when you're at
the most risk, if you ask me. That's I why I'm taking
you on the mission "Underworks Automata."
Let's see if you've still got the basics down.
*Go with Jan only and complete the mission
with an S Rank on Hard difficulty or above."
"自信を過信にしてはならない！"

"おお、君か！　最近頑張っているらしいな！
謙遜せずともよい、その活躍は
私にとっても喜ばしいことだからな！
それだけ活躍しているということは
実力にも自信がつき始めた頃合いだろう？
だが、そういうときが一番危ないのだ！
振り返りも含め、今一度私と共に
「機甲種性能調査：地下坑道」へ赴くぞ！
※ジャンのみ同行、
ハード以上Ｓランククリア"
